sentences.en: As he tried to crawl away, he was hit in the shoulder.
sentences.cn: 他试图爬走时肩膀中枪了。

sentences.en: As I sidestepped, the bottle hit me on the left hip.
sentences.cn: 我侧一步要躲闪的时候，瓶子打中了我的左髋部。

sentences.en: can't go into a bar lately without being hit on.
sentences.cn: 最近只要去酒吧，没有不受到注意的

sentences.en: First a house took a direct hit and then the rocket exploded.
sentences.cn: 首先一幢房子被直接击中，接着火箭弹爆炸了。

sentences.en: Graham hit him across the face with the gun.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆用枪击打他的脸部。

sentences.en: He admits to having hit the lowest point in his life .
sentences.cn: 他承认自己跌到了一生中的最低谷。

sentences.en: He hit back angrily, saying such remarks were childishly simplistic.
sentences.cn: 他愤怒地反击，说这些话太过幼稚。

sentences.en: He hit her on the head, causing her too to spurt blood.
sentences.cn: 他击中了她的头部，她也开始流血。

sentences.en: He pushed everyone full speed ahead until production hit a bottleneck.
sentences.cn: 他催促所有人拼命干活，直到生产遭遇瓶颈。

sentences.en: He raised the hammer and hit the bell.
sentences.cn: 他举起钟锤敲钟。

sentences.en: He saved one shot when the ball hit him on the head.
sentences.cn: 球砸中他的脑袋，从而让他化解了一次射门。

sentences.en: He was hit by a car.
sentences.cn: 他被汽车撞了。

sentences.en: he was struck by a hit-and-run driver.
sentences.cn: 他被肇事后逃跑的司机撞的。

sentences.en: her work can be hit-or-miss.
sentences.cn: 她的工作可能行也可能不行。

sentences.en: her work can be hit-or-miss.
sentences.cn: 她的工作可能行也可能不行。

sentences.en: His jaw was broken after he was hit on the head.
sentences.cn: 他的头部受重击之后下颌骨折了。

sentences.en: Leatherdale was hit resoundingly on the side of the head.
sentences.cn: 莱瑟戴尔头部一侧遭到响亮的一击。

sentences.en: New $750,000 infomercials, featuring artists like Cher, have recently hit the screens.
sentences.cn: 耗资75万美元、有雪儿等艺人出镜的新的名人电视促销节目近来播出了。

sentences.en: Our ship took a direct hit and sank
sentences.cn: 例句：我们的船被直接击中下沉了。

sentences.en: Our ship took a direct hit and sank.
sentences.cn: 我们的船被直接击中下沉了。

sentences.en: picking a remedy can be a bit hit-and-miss.
sentences.cn: 挑选治疗法可能会有点随意性。

sentences.en: Problems will crop up and hit you before you are ready.
sentences.cn: 你还未准备好，问题就会突然出现并打击你。

sentences.en: The dug-outs were secure from everything but a direct hit.
sentences.cn: 除非是直接被击中，否则这个地下掩体是非常安全的。

sentences.en: The infantry would use hit and run tactics to slow attacking forces.
sentences.cn: 步兵团可能会使用打了就跑的战术来阻滞进攻部队。

sentences.en: The tanks exploded as the plane hit the ground.
sentences.cn: 飞机坠地时油箱发生爆炸。

sentences.en: The village has been hit by a devastating drought.
sentences.cn: 那个村庄遭受了严重的干旱。

sentences.en: tried to hit me up for a loan.
sentences.cn: 试图请求我贷款

sentences.en: When they hit the rocks, they were just 500 yards offshore.
sentences.cn: 他们触礁时离海岸仅有500码。

sentences.en: Which band had a hit with ‘Bohemian Rhapsody’?
sentences.cn: 《波希米亚狂想曲》是哪支乐队风行一时的歌曲？

phrases.tran_cn: 严重打击；大力击球；坠入情网；（美口）经济上的破产
使受到沉重的打击，使…遭受严重的挫折
（性）吸引地注意：对性吸引自发地且通常不受欢迎地注意
成为新闻头条；被大肆宣传
使人满足；正合需要；恰到好处
请求，要求：尤指接近并向（某人）索要金钱
肇事（或故意损害）后逃跑的；肇事后逃跑造成的损失
可能成功也可能不成功，随意的

trans.tran_cn: 打，击中，成功而轰动一时的事物/人，浏览，一剂，凶杀，查询结果

trans.tran_en: to touch someone or something quickly and hard with your hand, a stick etc

trans.tran_cn: 打，撞击，击中，击球，使受严重影响，进攻，使突然想起，达到，遇到困难，按
trans.tran_en: to touch someone or something quickly and hard with your hand, a stick etc
